name: Olympic Spectacular
overview:
Eleven great TRACK & FIELD events in this superb graphic similution combine to make this the real 'MICRO' Olympic games.
Choose between:
Five running events -- 100, 200, 400, 800 and 1500 metres.
Three throwing events -- javelin, discus and hammer.
Three hammer jumping events -- long jump, high jump and pole jump.
In each event you can compare against a 'world record'.
